original_text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you, if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses.
korean_text: 너희가 각각 마음으로부터 형제를 용서하지 아니하면 나의 하늘 아버지께서도 너희에게 이와 같이 하시리라

sentences.original_text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 나의 하늘 아버지께서도 너희에게 행하시리라

sentences.original_text: if ye from your hearts forgive not
every one his brother their trespasses
